p.style: -qt-paragraph-type:empty; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px; -qt-block-indent:0; text-indent:0px; font-size:14pt; font-weight:600; color:#00aa00;

p.span: In addition to displaying all objects, this browser allows you to select objects using the left mouse click on the desired position of the list, or, if the browser window is in focus, you can navigate using the arrows.

p.style: -qt-paragraph-type:empty; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px; -qt-block-indent:0; text-indent:0px; font-size:12pt; color:#000000;

p.span: If the selected object was deleted manually (using the panel buttons or hotkeys), the next object in the list will be automatically selected, if it exists, if it does not exist, then the previous one, otherwise the object is not selected.
If the object was destroyed by merging with another object, the object selection is reset (no object is selected)

p.style: -qt-paragraph-type:empty; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px; -qt-block-indent:0; text-indent:0px; font-size:12pt; color:#000000;
-qt-paragraph-type:empty; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px; -qt-block-indent:0; text-indent:0px; font-size:10pt; color:#000000;
